info.name: smtp_server
info.description: Email server name or IP address.

info.name: smtp_port
info.description: TCP port the email server is listening on.

info.name: smtp_tls
info.description: A string, either 'true' or 'false' that defines whether the email server requires encryption.

info.name: smtp_username
info.description: Authentication string of a user allowed to send emails through the email server.

info.name: smtp_password
info.description: Password associated with the specified user.

info.name: api_server
info.description: Kinetic Request CE API Web Application

info.name: api_username
info.description: Name of user account that has permission to use the API

info.name: space_slug
info.description: Slug of the Space where the User will be created.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enables debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
